titles.title: Hetalia: Axis Powers Fan Disc
ヘタリア Axis Powers ファンディスク
Hetalia: Axis Powers Fan Disc

anime.description: Hetalia Axis Powers Fan Disc contains an unreleased episode and the "Chibitalia" and "America`s Storehouse Cleaning" sections from the original series remade into separate episodes.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.

character.name: Igirisu
character.description: A nation that was once a pirate and tormented Spain, the United Kingdom is a gentleman who is known for having terrible cooking skills (although America enjoys his food), a foul mouth, and huge eyebrows. He does not get along well with France or Russia, and can sometimes be cynical, particularly towards his somewhat estranged sibling America. Despite being mocked by the other nations for it, England is a strong believer of unicorns, faeries, and magic, going so far as to literally curse his enemies. England cannot hold his liquor well and is a very unhappy sort of drunk. He once formed an alliance with Japan because he felt lonely. He is classified as a tsundere character.

episode.title: おれさまにっき その2
The Awesome Me Diaries Part 2
Ore-sama Nikki Sono 2
